text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Covered county" means:
a county that has adopted home rule powers under Article XI-F of the Maryland Constitution; or
Anne Arundel County, Calvert County, Frederick County, Howard County, or Washington County.

"Family of low or moderate income" means a family or individual that a covered county determines cannot afford a price or rent sufficient to induce private enterprise in the covered county to build enough adequate, safe, and sanitary housing without the assistance of a program.
"Program" means a residential mortgage program under this subtitle.
